game.name: Jade's Journey 2
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, Steam 트레이딩 카드, 컨트롤러 일부 지원, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: After realizing that having powers means having responsibilities Jade decides to live up to her role as the Chosen One, even if that means leaving her father for a while!
game.shortDescriptionEn: After realizing that having powers means having responsibilities Jade decides to live up to her role as the Chosen One, even if that means leaving her father for a while!
